headline: Will AEP’s (AEP) US$1.20 Billion MISO Transmission Win Reshape Its Long-Term Grid Investment Narrative?
summary: Recently, the Midcontinent Independent System Operator selected a joint venture between American Electric Power subsidiaries (Transource Energy) and Berkshire Hathaway Energy to build a nearly 190-mile, 765-kV transmission line in Wisconsin, representing a US$1.20 billion investment targeted for a 2034 in-service date. This long-distance, high-voltage project is part of MISO’s long-range transmission buildout, potentially reinforcing AEP’s role in large-scale grid infrastructure and future...

headline: Bloom Energy (BE) Rockets 12.8% After Bagging New Billion-Dollar Deal
summary: We recently published Wall Street Can’t Keep up With These 10 Stocks on Fire. Bloom Energy Corporation (NYSE:BE) was one of the top performers on Thursday. Bloom Energy rallied for a second day on Thursday, jumping 12.81 percent to close at $121.84 apiece after securing another $2.65 billion worth of fuel cell supply deal with […]
